page.title: 07DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content:
{ A day in the life of Louise Edwards.
Today is the 20th of July in the summer of 1985. I have chosen this date to be a fair representation of a day in my life. My name is Louise Edwards, I am 15 years old .I live with my mother, father, sister Lisa, who is 14 and my brother Lance, who is 12. We live in the village of Barnsley near Cirencester. I have chosen a non - school day. I get up at about 9:oo, have breakfast and watch television. I go to work in the Village Pub at 11:30. I normally go to Cirencester in the afternoon to meet my friends. I stay with a friend until 6:00 and then we go roller skating at the Sport Centre. My mother or father collect me and maybe Lisa and Lance at 10:30. We get home at 10:45,and go straight to bed.
